events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our development team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster as a Software Developer candidate.
A recruiter specializing in technical roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of our hiring process.
Your profile matches the basic qualifications. We would like to schedule an initial screening call to discuss your experience further.
Thank you for your prompt reply confirming your availability for the initial screening interview. We look forward to speaking with you.
The technical interview has been scheduled for you on May 10th at 3 PM UTC, where our senior engineers will assess your software development skills.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding abilities and problem-solving skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM. This will cover company culture, benefits, and career growth opportunities.
The HR interview went well, and the team is impressed with your fit and enthusiasm for the role and our company values.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position that includes a competitive salary and benefits package.
We have received your feedback regarding the offer, and you have expressed excitement about joining our engineering team.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are excited to welcome you aboard and start the onboarding process.
Your onboarding has officially begun. You will receive access to our systems and will meet your new team members soon.
The hiring process is complete and you have successfully joined our engineering department as a Software Engineer.
